name: WHITEBEAK
description: This is a  story about a boy entering an imaginary space created by his own subconsciousness that reflects his desire. He felt tired from all sort of things happened in reality that eventually induced the formation of the space. There, he met a clone of himself who has a completely different personality, unlike him being a dull person that is always afraid to take risks in life. Through the adventures, he began to realize that keep wandering in a self-created fantasy is never the right solution, but simply escapism. He then made his mind to finally walk out of this and face the reality for the very first time.
